short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to help CCAR owners to view their daily or overall CryptoCar assets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to help CCAR owners to view their daily or overall CryptoCar assets. Inside the CryptoCar NFT game, it's so hard to check your pending rewards. You have to check each car's data by clicking a button. This extension will auto gather those data and including existing CCAR assets and users will have a birds-eye view of total assets and overall assets including unclaimed rewards.
